results.title: The Birds [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Gaumont and Alfred Hitchcock
results.brief_description: From Daphne Du Maurier’s short story, Hitchcock has created a bizarre and violent allegory for the apocalypse, starring Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor as young lovers who are attached by ferocious birds.

constellations_other.name: Easter Eggs on screen
constellations_other.description: People have been slipping secrets into films, games and television for as long as they have existed.

results.description: From Daphne Du Maurier’s short story, Hitchcock has created a bizarre and violent allegory for the apocalypse. A peaceful Californian coastal town is set upon by birds of all kinds who start attacking humans with increasing ferocity. Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor star in the film as a pair of young lovers, but the real stars are the realistic special effects, the chilling sounds and music of maestro Bernard Herrmann, and Hitchcock’s gleefully sadistic flair with the film medium. Cast also includes Suzanne Pleshette and Jessica Tandy. Cinematography by Robert Burks.
description_for_label: From Daphne Du Maurier’s short story, Hitchcock has created a bizarre and violent allegory for the apocalypse. A peaceful Californian coastal town is set upon by birds of all kinds who start attacking humans with increasing ferocity. Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor star in the film as a pair of young lovers, but the real stars are the realistic special effects, the chilling sounds and music of maestro Bernard Herrmann, and Hitchcock’s gleefully sadistic flair with the film medium. Cast also includes Suzanne Pleshette and Jessica Tandy. Cinematography by Robert Burks.

results.title: Low deposit, easy terms
results.brief_description: Sue Ford was one of the first feminist photographers and filmmakers in Australia, initiating her practice during the early 1960s in Melbourne. An active member of many feminist film co-operatives, her works explore Australian identity and feminism, excavating the effects of Australia’s colonial past through playful, innovative and experimental films. In Low Deposit Easy Terms, Ford interrogates Australia’s obsession with car culture, but instead of open Outback roads, the viewer tours inner-city car dealerships, home garages and junkyards where life struggles to grow.

constellations_other.name: Alternate histories and futures
constellations_other.description: Sue Ford's Egami reimagines contemporary life through a feminist and colonial lens.

results.title: Closure
results.brief_description: A young girl reflects on her connections with her family and friends and she attempts to discover why she feels like she is being ignored. She focuses on the experiences from her past but continually feels an intrinsic connection to water. Only later does she discover why this is the case.

results.title: Visiting Grandpa
results.creator_credit: Ethan Price, Ethan Hawkins, Riley Elson and Luke Breaden
results.brief_description: My name is Mick and I enjoy lots of exciting activities but not the activity of visiting Grandpa every Sunday. That is, until I find a photo album and discover I have more in common with Grandpa than I can imagine. Come and explore how two different people make a connection.

results.title: Soldier On
results.brief_description: Written from a collection of true stories, this film shows a boy of 15 years old delivering a message through an interview that must be heard and understood. Relationships are how we all connect in life, so make yours positive. Written, directed and edited by Billy Peters, performed by Conor Merrigan-Turner.

results.title: The Tank Gang: A Say No to Bullies Story
results.creator_credit: Willem Durrand, Tahalia Durrand and Ruben Durrand
results.brief_description: This is the story of the Tank Gang. The Tank Gang love playing together, even with Jack, the bully. One day, Jack goes too far and the Tank Gang see how putting up with Jack has meant that their friend got hurt. The friends all learn the importance of standing up for each other, not bullying and being good friends.

results.title: The Mansion [game trailer]
results.brief_description: It’s a moonless night… Let’s go explore a mansion. In ‘The Mansion’, a nameless character finds himself with the task of searching an old mansion. Although he can’t understand the lost children it doesn’t take a true connection to know only he can help. The story is told through a platformer format, inspired by games such as Super Mario Bros.

results.title: My City Walkabout
results.creator_credit: Emmie Seaton, Mateuse Pingol and MatEm Productions
results.brief_description: ‘My City Walkabout’ is a film with a French New Wave aesthetic that follows an Aboriginal man searching for his place in modern Australian society. Set in the man’s dream, the film explores magic realism sequences to illustrate the protagonist’s desire to alter his reality and ultimately find his identity.

results.title: Connecting
results.creator_credit: Bailey Humphries, Emma Reid and Olivia Walker
results.brief_description: Grandma Swift laments her disconnectedness from the outside world, a quick idea takes a comical journey through modern and old time methods of communication leading to a modern day twist at the end.
